message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe it will be extremely valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects its high value, but also demonstrates my willingness to negotiate a fair deal.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,000,000 doesn't quite meet my minimum requirements. I understand the product's value to you, and I'm willing to work with you. How about we settle on $1,100,000? This would allow us both to walk away with a profitable deal.

I understand your position, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,050,000. This is the maximum I can afford for the product.
